LanguageData.Firefoam.label: firefoam
LanguageData.Firefoam.description: Allows the construction of firefoam poppers; fire-safety buildings which spread fire-retardant foam in response to encroaching flames.
LanguageData.GeothermalPower.label: geothermal power
LanguageData.GeothermalPower.description: Allows you to build geothermal power plants on top of steam geysers, for uninterrupted power.
LanguageData.HospitalBed.label: hospital bed
LanguageData.HospitalBed.description: Allows colonists to construct hospital beds which increase chance of successful medical work.
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer.label: multi-analyzer
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer.description: Allows colonists to build multi-analyzers which increase research speed, and allow higher-level research projects, if placed near a research bench.
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor.label: vitals monitor
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor.description: Allows colonists to build vitals monitors which increase patients treatment quality if placed next to medical beds.
LanguageData.Cryptosleep.label: cryptosleep casket
LanguageData.Cryptosleep.description: Allows colonists to construct cryptosleep caskets, which can put living beings in a state of suspended animation.
LanguageData.ComponentAssembly.label: component assembly
LanguageData.ComponentAssembly.description: Allows you to build the Component Assembly Bench, where colonists can make components from simple materials.
LanguageData.PoweredArmor.label: powered armor
LanguageData.PoweredArmor.description: Neuro-memetic robotics and advanced plasteel weaving technologies allow you to build the power armor and power armor helmets.
LanguageData.ChargedShot.label: charged shot
LanguageData.ChargedShot.description: Understand the secrets of pulse-charged energy/projectile munitions. Allows you to build the charge rifle.
LanguageData.MultibarrelWeapons.label: multibarrel weapons
